text: Saratov (), is a city and a major port on the Volga River. It is upstream (north) of Volgograd. It was founded in the year 1590. Saratov had a population of 827,000 in 2010. It is the administrative center of Saratov Oblast. == References == Category:Capitals of oblasts of Russia Category:Cities and towns in Saratov Oblast
title: Saratov
